description: T.81 Lime - Crown lift to 5m from ground level over vehicle entrance.T.105 Turkey Oak - 2m reduction of primary branch to reduce end loading.T.106 Holly - Remove southern stem (Decay).T.109 & T110 Hornbeam - 1-2m Lateral reduction on all sides sympathetically shaping into upper canopy.T.111 Hornbeam - 1-2m Lateral reduction of lower western branches sympathetically shaping into upper canopy.T.112 Hornbeam - 1-2m Lateral reduction of lower South & East branches sympathetically shaping into upper canopy.T.120 Turkey Oak - Crown lift to 5m from ground level all round, remove ivy & deadwood.
